title: Love Potion No. 9
lyrics:
[no intro]
 
[single strum]
(Am) I took my troubles down to (Dm)Madame Ruth
(Am) You know that Gypsy with the (Dm)gold-capped tooth
[normal strum]
(C)She's got a pad down on (Am)Thirty-Fourth and Vine
(Dm)Selling little bottles of
(E-break) Love Potion Number (Am)Nine
 
(Am) I told her that I was a (Dm)flop with chicks
(Am) I've been this way since 19-(Dm)-56
She (C)looked at my palm and she (Am)made a magic sign
She (Dm)said what you need is
(E-break) Love Potion Number (Am)Nine
 
She (Dm)bent down and turned around and gave me a wink
She (B)said I'm gonna mix it up right here in the sink
It (Dm)smelled like turpentine it looked like India Ink
I (E-break)held my nose, I closed my eyes
(E-E-break) I took a drink
 
(Am) I didn't know if it was (Dm)day or night
(Am) I started kissing every(Dm)thing in sight
But (C)when I kissed a cop down on (Am)Thirty-Fourth and Vine
He (Dm)broke my little bottle of
(E-break) Love Potion Number (Am)Nine
 
[kazoo]
| (Dm) | (Dm) |
| (B) | (B) |
| (Dm) | (Dm) |
I (E-break)held my nose, I closed my eyes
(E-E-break) I took a drink
 
(Am) I didn't know if it was (Dm)day or night
(Am) I started kissing every(Dm)thing in sight
I (C)had so much fun that I'm (Am)going back again
I (Dm)wonder what happens with
(E-break) Love Potion Number (Am)Ten
(Dm) Love Potion Number (Am)Ten
(Dm) Love Potion Number (Am)Ten
(Dm-break) Love Potion Number (Am-tremolo)Teeen [end]
